mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dialogo dell' imprese militari et amorose di Monsignor Giovio Vescouo di Nocera: con vn Ragionamento di Messer Lodouico Domenichi, nel medesimo soggetto. : Con la tauola
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Giovio, Paolo, 1483-1552
Rouillé, Guillaume, 1518?-1589
Thibaron-Joly (Firm)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: According to Brunet, the two works are ordinarily found together.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First title in volume with: Le imprese heroiche et morali / ritrouate da M. Gabriello Symeoni. -- In Lione, 1559. Binder: Thibaron-Joly. Unidentified armorial binding, crest, with motto, Victor et fidelis. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 395.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Italy--Early works to 1800
